name: Operation Shockwave
description:
A simple and fun clicker defence game where the object is to survive for all long as possible. It takes great timing and patience to hold out for a good high score.

Defend the earth from an asteroid shower by firing a deflection pulse to divert the dangerous asteroids. Collect health and super deflection pulse power-ups along the way to make your survival easier.

The fate of the earth depends on your clicker finger. Save us from the asteroids!
